units.title: Lentivirus production and infection for CRISPR perturbation
units.text: The reporter 3T3 cell lines generated above were cultured in six-well plates and infected with lentivirus containing dual sgRNA cassette targeting each gene individually. BFP fluorescence was measured at 7, 14 and 20 days postinfection.
units.rationale: This describes a clear, actionable protocol step for delivering CRISPR perturbations using lentivirus and quantifying outcomes via fluorescence over time.

units.title: sgRNA cassette validation and use in eCas9-inducible cell line
units.text: lentivirus carrying a dual gRNA cassette only targeting one gene was packaged and used to infect the eCas9-inducible cell line. Cells were then collected by FACS and used to make embryoid bodies.
units.rationale: This details a specific procedural step involving viral packaging, infection of a modified cell line, and downstream cell sorting for organoid generation.
